lead_paragraph: Defending champions Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams are back in action at the Australian Open on Friday with comfortable looking hurdles to overcome to reach the fourth round.
snippet: Defending champions Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams are back in action at the Australian Open on Friday with comfortable looking hurdles to overcome to reach the fourth round....

headline.main: Djokovic and Williams Target Fourth-Round Spots
headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Williams Target Fourth-Round Spots
